title: Topic 003 Question 028
body: You have a Microsoft 365 tenant that uses a domain named contoso.com.
A user named User1 leaves your company. The mailbox of User1 is placed on Litigation Hold, and then the account of User1 is deleted from Azure Active
You need to copy the content of the User1 mailbox to a folder in the existing mailbox of another user named User2.
How should you complete the PowerShell command? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
